snippet: Officials want to generate $232 million more from New York City Transit, but which MetroCards to increase prices for in March 2013 remains in doubt.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority officials want to generate $232 million more from New York City Transit, but are undecided on structure of fare increases, which will begin in March 2013.
lead_paragraph: Officials want to generate $232 million more from New York City Transit, but which MetroCards to increase prices for in March 2013 remains in doubt.

headline.seo: Raising Fare for Subway and Buses Is a Question of How, Not When or Why
headline.main: M.T.A. Weighs Who Will Pay When It Raises Transit Fares
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Weighs Who Will Pay When It Raises Transit Fares
